Description.Title: Average GAI on a specific thermal time window

Input.description: Green Area Index of the day
Input.name: gAI

Input.description: Thermal time increase of the day
Input.name: deltaTT

Input.description: Maximum Leaf Area Index reached the current day
Input.name: pastMaxAI_t1

Input.description: List of daily shoot thermal time in the window dedicated to average
Input.name: listTTShootWindowForPTQ1_t1

Input.description: List of daily Green Area Index in the window dedicated to average
Input.name: listGAITTWindowForPTQ_t1

Output.description: Maximum Leaf Area Index reached the current day
Output.name: pastMaxAI

Output.description: List of daily shoot thermal time in the window dedicated to average
Output.name: listTTShootWindowForPTQ1

Output.description: List of daily Green Area Index in the window dedicated to average
Output.name: listGAITTWindowForPTQ
